items.name: the-ai-overload-why-most-companies-are-getting-automation-wrong
items.title: The AI Overload: Why Most Companies Are Getting Automation Wrong
items.excerpt: AI was supposed to save us time.Instead, it’s made many businesses busier — and less creative than ever.Across Canada and the U.S., companies are racing to “adopt AI,” yet few are asking why or how. The result? A wave of half-baked automations, disconnect...
